# subscript(_:)

**Instance Subscript**

Gets or sets the component with a specific dynamically supplied type.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor @preconcurrency subscript(componentType: any Component.Type) -> (any Component)? { get set }
```

## Accessing members

- **subscript(_:)**: Gets or sets the component of the specified type.

items.description: Gets or sets the component of the specified type.
